vZWuC5zQHWFXxfALeeAuhg.text: Hands down one of the best places I've ever been to. I have ordered the dinner specials AND the hoagies and both were absolutely finger-licking good. The food is always hot and fresh and the service is always good. I'm not a friendly person but the guy who takes care of me is always polite. This is an amazing place and I plan to be a regular patron. I just moved here from NJ for the year (work) and never thought I'd find a good "fast food" joint. This place is it. Hats off to management and the crew----you guys know your food.

jQXmX9mGmdimwBVSoCJSfQ.text: Great place to eat. Fast service and very affordable. Cheesesteak hoagies are the best!

834E-NhtqLsIu2-WWYQzWg.text: A really good philly cheese steak with a bunch of different variations, the burgers are also good. Its got a diner atmosphere the food is cooked quickly.

8wNgsfnWiSsmiMS1K7_FFg.text: No, this isn't a new restaurant.  For 30 years, east Charlotte enjoyed the Steak 'n Hoagie Shop and due to roadwork, they have found a new home in Stallings...and I'm grateful.    I would drive by the Burger Shop and think maybe but it never had enough cars out front for me to go inside.  That closed, the building looked dilapidated but one day, it opened as Kavkaz.  Every time I drove by Kavkaz, I thought of that Seinfeld when Jerry convinced Babu to open a Pakistani restaurant that failed.  I think he was deported or something...I loved that show.    Anyway, the Steak 'n Hoagie Shop opened and its doing very well.    I tried just a regular cheesesteak along with the onion rings and I must say, I'm impressed.  Since I've been down here, I have yet to have a really great cheesesteak (had a couple good ones, lots of someone's interpretation of a philly) until now.  Everything was very good and even the onion rings were great.  I look forward to going back and being more adventurous with my order.  The only disappointment is that I wish they had fried mushrooms but oh well.

fsJCO-_nq0wJS0-LFy_2zA.text: Excellent friendly service with really good hoagies, fries and onion rings!

zSIZNJFhQQx8ra-PprJj2g.text: I am from Philly and have been searching for something that even comes close to a Philly Cheese Steak down here for 4 years and have been consistantly disappointed. My search has ended. Can it be as great as a Philly Cheese Steak IN PHILLY?? That is asking a lot.....but this is very very close. I will be back!!

dhvmpjeA3_wxZ2UVD04oBg.text: Fantastic hoagies! Fries are crisp and the service is quick. Thank god it's by the school!

wzdIeEuKOPORA93053e_lw.text: I especially love their fries as it is crispy the way that I like it! I have had the Bigfoot Burger which was quite filling.

5wuNfuSpXQ8RG0TF4-Uxqw.text: Friendly, Super food!!  My husband & I lived in Crete, Greece for 3 years and  this so close to the Greek food I had to make sure I was still in North Carolina.  Wish I could give it more stars!!

wnax28yS0NCX91YNYDwTgw.text: Overall not a bad steak sandwich, the French fries can use a little help.  Price was fair and the size of the sandwich was perfect.

kAY_XfeFNvCUsdYFF-LqEg.text: We so love your Greek Salad w/ Grilled Chicken. It is the bomb.

-WajNIN0kXU-E0q80IW0Wg.text: First, congrats to them for still being open! The location is cursed and nothing seems to last. Yesterday was my first visit and I will be back. I had a basic philly cheesesteak with a greek salad & soda for the low price of $7 (and some change). They offer a nice variety of items, the employees were nice & my food was ready in less than 10 minutes. Was it the best philly I've had, no, but it was very good and I have no complaints.

_RWNqOCGADUJ7IJE1w9-Vw.text: Just what it said Steak & Hoagie why can't everything In life be this simple. Philly was great, My partner loved the burger too.Crisp fries too

JBW1TQXTUSjk0OgHcGmV6w.text: Im from Philly...lots of experience with cheese steaks and hoagies....have in nc sc for 20 years..this is the best sandwhich had in all that time!

Bo9gMFAneyi50GBy_kw_VQ.text: Two thumbs up!! Great heros! Pasta salad I love!!! My fiance brings me home the pasta salad when he goes! I get off work and love this treat!! Sandwhich are good, bread is soft, great pork chops, and the fries are delish! Love this place! You won't be disappointed

BC49FP72Q7nr4gcuxN_mGA.text: The cheesesteak is really awesome and I love the pasta salad. Prices are very reasonable and the employees are always friendly.

RcMdCXdo7vmBNnh7sjtmnw.text: Like a good cheesesteak?  This is a damn fine choice! I stopped here for a lunch based on an email recommendation, and was not a bit disappointed!  Great meat to cheese and veggie ratios and it was perfectly seasoned!  Prices were great, service was awesome and food came out hot, accurate and pretty quick.  I will definitely be back any time I'm even close to Matthews, NC!!

A3mrIhExCTdG0K3Tuh6OcA.text: The best subs in town. Fresh breads and ingredients prepared by great sandwich engineer.  The fried fish and shrimp ain't bad either.

PND86boVY7DPBupYX5gkjw.text: Classic  Steak n Cheeses.  I'm a big fan of their Chicken Cheesesteak. Local joint feel with other items like Burgers, Fish and Gyros, if not in the mood for S&C.

AilYHMxgUtTvI4KNmmnXDQ.text: The Black and Blue Cheesesteak with added banana peppers was delicious! A great find on our way from Asheville to Oak Island.

photos.caption: Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States

WZZxFptEBlIavW8eEbAh0w.text: Great cheesesteaks at an amazing value. They check all the boxes... good bun, shredded and peppered beef, cheese perfectly melted, and grilled onions. Perfection!

yd4OSxtnh8W4zGnr8D4VxQ.text: Again we were impressed with what we ordered at the Steak and Hogie Place in Indian Trail NC. I ordered the Gyro and the husband had the steak Hogie. It was awesome as usual. I love this place. We have never been disappointed.

oJZD6l8Z5UPUs-BeaZkzEA.text: The best sandwich shop around and is a very popular lunch spot. My go to order is the New Jersey sandwich with fries. Fries are always cooked perfectly with a nice crunch to them and the sandwich is delicious. all of this served up to you by some friendly folks.

0TgQ_wlN0ZU_0SU9zFEY_w.text: Just started going here. Was recommended to me by a friend. I've had the Texas sandwich and shrimp po boy. They gave daily specials which are awesome. Food is delicious, fast, and piping hot. Fries are that crispy kind that have a great crunch. Great place for lunch, but I went there for dinner the other night (not as many people so it felt almost like a private chef feeling). I can't wait to try the other items on the menu- looking forward to the Greek bowls. The people that work there are nice and really seem to care that you enjoyed your meal and got everything you wanted. New favorite!

photos.caption: Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States. My black n blue. Ate every last bit. Perfect lunch!
Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States. Oh boy shrimp po boy! Best fries. So much shrimp I needed a fork (which they gave me) also gave me extra sauce
Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States. Texas ranch sandwich. Awesome hoagie bread and all the ingredients were so fresh and crisp. Loved it!

qKVZotOP7wxkewh8wHOvNw.text: Amazing hoagie bread. Top notch service. Good value. The kids split an adult 13" Italian. It was just what you'd want in an Italian. The baby had chicken strips which were as good as you could hope for. I had a cheese steak supreme that was just OK. The cheese and toppings were great. The meat was tender but a tad bland.   The waitress was very helpful and even had the forethought to bring an extra plate since my kids were sharing.   The sides were the surprise here. Expecting only fries but had a real fruit salad, and pretty darn good green beans (the waitress was spot on, good but needs a touch of salt).  Definitely will be coming back soon to try another hoagie soon.

xE3ckghMM8w00gBdatJAtg.text: Excellent cheesesteak and good nana pudding. Expensive pudding for the amount you get but the price/value of the sand which is excellent. Also they have Cheerwine which is a must for me.

CoHvItwTnihT3LsCEZBL3w.text: Deliscious, fresh! So good. Love the regular and chicken cheesesteaks. Really nice people too.

X18PoKTvgrYaDW77RI-GMw.text: I had the Philly and it was really good.  Burgers are really good and the onion rings are the best I've had in a long while.  We will Definitely be coming back!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States

q0yrHOXp8A52eIBwbR60HA.text: The best location of the best place to get a cheese steak in Charlotte area. Fresh backed bread daily, try the New Jersey cheese steak. One of the best things I've ever put in my mouth!

CSmOlXayR_wIT0cjA4fxZA.text: Good cheesesteak with fried onions, True to the philly cheesesteak. Importance is good bread which the owner has for his hoagies and cheesesteaks. The Italian hoagie was also really good and True to the philly kind and meats. Busy place and the owner was patient and nice guy. I gave him props for a good authentic cheesesteak being from Philly.

J7INsSa3rdmWM3zjLXuRWA.text: A great takeout spot for cheese steak fans. Surprisingly the best thing they offer is a huge and delicious Greek salad with grilled chicken and feta. Can feed two people, delicious and very filling!

1_pG1PZwWkS1Nq2_fbePfA.text: I love its fries and it is crisp. I usually get the tuna hoagie and if you get the large size it is enough for two people. The lady who takes care of my order is super nice and the service is fast too. The steak and cheese hoagie is also good. If you are in the area definitely give this place a try. You won't be disappointed.

xegUwqWcXEGHXY2GpyLw_Q.text: Went here with my wife and daughter over the weekend. We've been searching for a local place where we could get cheesesteaks and sandwiches like we used to get back in NJ/NY. This place met out expectations greatly. First, you gotta have a good roll. The cheese steaks my wife and I got were awesome, rolls were chewy and soft and the steak meat was grilled perfectly. The fries were great and my daughter, who's very picky, devoured her chicken fingers. We will definitely be back.

1_F52rNel6auNPA4JPqzsA.text: YAY FOR THEIR GREEK SALAD WITH CHICKEN!!!    Their salad is probably one of the best that I've ever had.  My husband brought one home for me, and my first instinct was to grab a knife and fork to cut it up.  I USUALLY have to cut salads into bite-size pieces since most restaurants tend to serve them with huge pieces of lettuce - but not this time.  No knife was necessary for anything...not even the chicken pieces on top - which were plentiful.  Also, I love feta cheese, so I was happy that they use small chunks of feta rather than crumbles of it.  To me, crumbles of feta cheese just don't taste as good as small chunks.   The cucumber slices were even decorative looking rather than just plain sliced.  This tells me that they really care about the appearance of their finished product.  The greek dressing was also good.   My only wish for the Matthews/Indian Trail location is that they had the Greco menu option that their other locations do.

photos.caption: Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States
Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States. Greek Salad w/Chicken!!  Hard to tell it in the picture, but they use small chunks of feta rather than crumbles.

ygmf5GKIqNMcxptgo5GBnQ.text: Couldnt finish what was a terrible cheese steak even for charlottes standards let alone philly

ZWywgHnqsCKG-sAwCG0eGw.text: I work close by & eat here 5-6 times per month, super friendly. Great food, lots of variety, aside from subs, they have burgers, fried seafood, & salads. My favorite is the grilled chicken pita wrap, awesome.

r3sBkQbGtVCsq1YwH7ADOg.text: Yummy, fast and lots to pick from! I got the chicken pita and my Grandson scarfed his kids turkey sub. Drive up window if you order ahead. Good idea, this place is hopping!

photos.caption: Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States. First time...yummy chicken pita with Supper Slaw

1f3UYadzoIZsG2xYdvGraw.text: Great! Best cheesesteak around for Charlotte. Fresh bread and good steak. The sides are great also!

hRYYulk0C1pDQUhPIA7PKA.text: My husband and I visited your at new location-really enjoyed our meal -we both had shrimp po boy sandwiches, with sides of fries and fresh fruit! -delicious!! We will visit again to explore! Very friendly customer service as well!

CuIMQe03WUFDquQm87UEAA.text: A clean and pleasant place with quick, polite service.  I ordered an Italian hoagie.  While the bun was toasted and the meat plentiful the meat itself was straight out of the fridge.  So you got a hot bun with cold fillings.  Hence the three starts.  I would go back and try a hot sandwich which I would think would be better.

xcKG6lHtIyoPk-QOvKvq8w.text: Very good! Probably the best Philly cheese steak sub around. Everything is fresh. They make their own bread and the portions are good. The onion rings are great! They use Valdosta onions and they fry them perfectly. They will be moving soon to a location on Potter rd and Old Monroe rd (the old BK).

5k7KXOiAn760T5_TUVA_uQ.text: This local favorite serves up perfect Philly cheesesteaks and a handful of Greek items. It all starts with the bread, which is baked in-house and provides the perfect foundation for the steak, provolone and onions. It's easily the best in Charlotte. Also the joint is always immaculate and the service is great. It is definitely a Gotta Try!

photos.caption: Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States
Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States. Philly cheesesteak.
Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States

xC5hrbi7EtBlX2adjMhpWA.text: Food is average to good-onion rings were good-they use Vidalia -super sweet. Chicken pita was good-the dill  sauce was not-authentic tziki would have been much better. Shared banana pudding for dessert-to be fair it was after 7 pm but it definitely was left over from lunch and pulled out of refrig. the surrounding Nilla wafers were soggy.   Casual place, parking lot

photos.caption: Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States. Casual dinner with &#39;nana pudding for dessert!!

1Ku62Sb0uOuCrbWQxftsaA.text: This is the only location I have ever tried, because I used to work nearby.  It has always been good each time I have had lunch or dinner.  There is never a wait, sometimes lunch can get busy though.    The staff is friendly.  After you order and pay at the counter, they bring you food out to you.  They also have a carry out window for drive up service.  The shop is small but clean.  The bathrooms aren't the greatest, so I would try to avoid if possible.    Recommend the black & blue hoagie or the pork chop dinner! The pork chop is my favorite.  It's delicious each time.  It comes with 2 sides.  Onion rings are good.  Cole slaw, could be better.  I've never had a bad experience.

photos.caption: Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States
Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States
Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States

bLM4uTsSTtwC2W5KU0NOdw.text: Steak and Hoagie is the cloest thing Charlotte gets to a real Philly Cheesesteak. Good Bread, Meat, Cheese, and perfectly carmelized onions. One of my favorite sandwiches in South Charlotte.

photos.caption: Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States

6QU0u44FBJsJEO-i1lrTZw.text: In town for Buisness; lunched there three days in a row. The Jersey, Philly, and Chicken cheese steaks were all great. Friendly, fast service.

5ck2OlnsoLa3hac4J1QjiQ.text: I love this place. The Greek salad is the best I've ever had. With all the construction around I'm glad they're staying open

kHwDV4vpunWgQUeHW5qAww.text: Wow! This place is awesome!! Great fish and shrimp and hoagies. The salads are good too. The bread is so fresh. The employees are so nice and friendly. What a wonderful place for Stallings!! I'll be back over and over again .

photos.caption: Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States. March 3, 2017 - awesome hoagies and great employees kjm
Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States. March 3, 2017 - awesome hoagies and great employees kjm

3jNz-1_G0zWVdYgvJEtwcQ.text: This place is worth trying if you have not!!! Home style atmosphere, friendly staff and really GOOD food. I lived in Philly for many years and since I've been in this area, this is as close as it gets to authentic (they need whiz, LOL). The Greek salad is tasty... the dressing is awesome! Overall, well worth the price and the 10 minute drive. I'll definitely be back and bring more of my family and friends. The owner even walks around and engages patrons. Nice touch. Keep it up, folks.

WoLVrYJiavYawDfhJFdFqg.text: This place has really good sandwiches. The fries and onion rings were great also. The chicken cheese steak was really good as well. I will definitely be back to this cute little spot.

photos.caption: Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States. Shrimp po boy light n crispy shrimp
Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States. Chicken cheese steak

IXaocmjsnSW-JEUHqgSdcA.text: Haven't stopped in here in a while. Went in today and food was fantastic as it always is. Greek salad with chicken is great. Large potion, both salad and chicken. Great prices too, $8 for the salad.    The place is clean and the people are friendly.   May be crowded at lunch but well worth it.

dNrXUeAza4QkshxrG3wR_g.text: This is MY FAVORITE place to have a Greek Salad! It is so delicious and the chicken is marinated to where it is juicy and tender. The dressing is to die for. Their steak and cheese sandwiches are also really good. Great place to wat with great customer service!

uXIq0qA-GCM1jKlAX1sgjA.text: Good tasting cheesesteak. Good fries. VERY friendly staff. Clean and pleasant. Shop was busy and people were ordering everything from the menu, which is indicative of the consistency of the quality of the food.

6o0FNSioQaP6I7SXHKrIMw.text: Great food, served hot!  Shop is clean, and staff is very nice as well!  I had the 7" Black and Blue which was very good. My girlfriend had the 7" New Jersey and she said it was excellent as well.

photos.caption: Photo of Steak 'n Hoagie Shop - Matthews, NC, United States. Clean shop and great food. Wednesday around 1:45 after the lunch rush.

dZJZDvQ1MpN00k_mn4dYog.text: I just ordered lunch from this location - asking for a simple Philly Cheesesteak sandwich with extra cheese.. This is by far the worst Cheesesteak sandwich that I have ever had.  There is hardly any cheese at all on the sandwich, and this is not the 1st time that this has occurred..   I will never eat her again..

jqBgsAqmcbhJ_hrmmYky2g.text: This place is a hidden gem. I've never heard of it until a few coworkers wanted to come here. It can definitely get packed around lunch time. Service is good and food came out quickly. I've gotten several sandwiches here. They were all good as well as the pasta salad. My coworker loves their pork chops. Prices are cheap and they do daily specials!
